body:
This is kind of a weird question, but who is coordinating these "PSA" posts, and where is it happening? I've seen multiple different users making them lately. I did post some of my own but I just copied the others because I'm weird that way, so I'm probably an exception.

I'm looking into something else that possibly involves these posts, so that information would be very helpful.
body_html:
This is kind of a weird question, but who is coordinating these "PSA" posts, and where is it happening? I've seen multiple different users making them lately. I did post some of my own but I just copied the others because I'm weird that way, so I'm probably an exception.

I'm looking into something else that possibly involves these posts, so that information would be very helpful.

body:
I've elevated my concerns to one of the discord mods for final clarification. It turns out someone must've posted a PSA at some point and everyone just copies them now.

There's some things that are true and others that aren't. I want to wait until peak hours tomorrow before I write a follow up post because the discord mod team has been a concern for a lot of people lately, including me, so I want it to have max visibility.
body_html:
I've elevated my concerns to one of the discord mods for final clarification. It turns out someone must've posted a PSA at some point and everyone just copies them now.

There's some things that are true and others that aren't. I want to wait until peak hours tomorrow before I write a follow up post because the discord mod team has been a concern for a lot of people lately, including me, so I want it to have max visibility.

body:
Whenever I see this kind of nonsense I call it out for what it is: Minimodding and a horrible attempt to seem helpful. 

Remember when writing "PSAs" and the like would get you mocked? I miss that.
body_html:
Whenever I see this kind of nonsense I call it out for what it is: Minimodding and a horrible attempt to seem helpful.

Remember when writing "PSAs" and the like would get you mocked? I miss that.

guild.name: Ruqqus

parent.body:
I've elevated my concerns to one of the discord mods for final clarification. It turns out someone must've posted a PSA at some point and everyone just copies them now.

There's some things that are true and others that aren't. I want to wait until peak hours tomorrow before I write a follow up post because the discord mod team has been a concern for a lot of people lately, including me, so I want it to have max visibility.
parent.body_html:
I've elevated my concerns to one of the discord mods for final clarification. It turns out someone must've posted a PSA at some point and everyone just copies them now.

There's some things that are true and others that aren't. I want to wait until peak hours tomorrow before I write a follow up post because the discord mod team has been a concern for a lot of people lately, including me, so I want it to have max visibility.

post.body: Or, Right Click -> Copy image link (depending on your browser)
post.body_html: Or, Right Click -> Copy image link (depending on your browser)
post.title: PSA: You can embed images in Ruqqus by Right Clicking -> Open image in new tab -> copy URL
